1.title: Financial .Net C# end-user Modules
1.description:
Several financial modules were implemented for the use of financial clients where a user could consult information about the balance of their credit card, schedule recurring payments to public services and subscribe to new financial services by signing electronic contracts.

In addition to the generation of reports with SAP technology http://www.crystalreports.com/

4.title: php crm reporting system
